title: Man I'm bored of those trolls
body:
Someone wants to play Urgot Support in ranked. I appreciate my LPs so I ban Urgot. He proceeds to insult me and saying he is going to report me. Picks Ivern support. I dodge. I have to wait 30 minutes and lost 10 LPs.
IS THIS A FAIR SYSTEM?!

replies.body: Yes, absolutely. Because the other alternative is that people get free dodges when people don't like what ever their teammates are playing.

> [{quoted}](name=Hellioning,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=9Bi8bOmj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-06T23:23:09.399+0000)
>
> Yes, absolutely. Because the other alternative is that people get free dodges when people don't like what ever their teammates are playing.

actually, the other alternative is banning champ select trolls. how much is riot paying you?
Playing Urgot support is not trolling. Playing Ivern support is even less trolling.

>
> Playing Urgot support is not trolling. Playing Ivern support is even less trolling.

doing the exact opposite of what your team wants you to do is trolling, friend.
Picking off meta is not trolling.

>
> Picking off meta is not trolling.

sure, if it's the exact opposite of what your team wants you to do, it is. and I'm banning your pick and basking in the tears.
If my team wants me to pick Leona, and I pick Nami instead, am I trolling?
Are you comparing me Urgot Support or Ivern support with Leona? Ivern wasn’t even that bad, but that guy started to insult me and I knew I wasn’t going to win with a guy like that on my team.

and yes, even riot confirms it in their "you want to play smite support singed, but your team does not want you to play smite support singed"

sorry to burst your bubble, but people don't like intentionally horrible picks.

And literally everyone complained about that and Riot had to jump in to reduce his punishment and clarify what they meant by that. (here is a hint: You don't get to report people for picking a champ you don't like.)

he still got banned. for good reason. if his teammates don't agree with his pick, he's forced to choose something good now. off meta players cry so hard lel.

Sure, I'll gladly play a Leona I'm bad at into a matchup I know is bad for her. 

Just don't blame me when we lose.
